input.sentences: i went to an amusement park last week .
there were a ton of decorations there .
i got to ride on some rides .
i had a lot of fun there .
output.sentences: The kids spent a lovely week at an amusement park.
There were a ton of decorations around the entire park.
They loved to ride on all the different rides available to them.
Many of them were extremely fast!
The smallest child of the bunch described it as " a lot of fun!"
